description: This file defines the interface for the DobbySpecGenerator class, which is responsible for generating JSON-based runtime specifications for applications, including environment variables, mounts, plugins, and resource configurations. It includes method declarations for various specialized JSON creation routines and configuration helpers.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating JSON specifications for application runtime environments based on various configurations.

methods.name: DobbySpecGenerator
methods.description: Constructor for DobbySpecGenerator class.

methods.name: virtual ~DobbySpecGenerator
methods.description: Destructor for DobbySpecGenerator class.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method to generate runtime specification JSON string from application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates JSON object representing environment variables.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates JSON object representing mount points.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates JSON object for RDK plugins.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for minidump plugin.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for App Service SDK plugin.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for network plugin.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates JSON representing a bind mount with source, destination, and options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines if GPU should be enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves system memory limit based on configuration.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves GPU memory limit based on configuration.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Returns a string representing CPU core configuration.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates JSON with classic plugin configurations.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for Ethan logging plugin.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for multicast socket plugin.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for ION memory plugin.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for Thunder plugin.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates JSON for OpenCDM plugin.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for private data mount.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates JSON mounts for FKPS.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for tmpfs mount.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates JSON for resource manager mount.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Fetches working directory configuration as JSON.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes JSON data for Ion heaps.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes URL strings.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds hole punch port configuration to specification JSON.
